content:
Entrants are required to complete these steps to be eligible for the sweepstakes. The winner will be selected at random among all eligible entries received and announced on or about January 12, 2019.

The grand prize will include the following:

  • Two-night stay in the Penthouse Suite at Royalton Park Avenue
  • $500 Gift Card
  • $150 Food & Beverage Credit
  • Private trainer for in-room (1 hour session)
  • In-room massage by Soothe Services

Sweepstakes Details:

  • Sweepstakes period term: January 1–January 11, 2019
  • Date of selection and date of winner notification: Jan 12
  • Email address for questions/comments social@chandeliercreative.com

*Restrictions may apply
